text: aur jab tere rub ne farishto se kaha ke main zameen mein qalifa banaane wala hoon, to unhone kaha, aise shaqs ko kyo paida karta hai jo zameen mein fasaad kare aur qoon bahaaye? aur hum teri tasbih humdh pakizgi bayaan karne waale hai, Allah taâ€™ala ne farmaaya jo mein jaanta hoon tum nahi jaante
